title: Definitions
context: [ยง6F-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the executive board of the judiciary history center. &ldquo;Center&rdquo; means the judiciary history center. The judiciary history center is an organized and permanent institution with a professional staff, essentially educational in purpose, which owns and utilizes tangible objects of service, history and art and cares for and exhibits them to the public on a regular schedule. &ldquo;Friends of the judiciary history center&rdquo; means the nonprofit citizens group organized to support the center. [L 1990, c 211, pt of ยง3]
